messages.message:
Is there a way to know why a job failed? I’m trying to run a flow with a huge input file (20mb and around 1200 pages) but it keeps failing without specifying the reason
```{"status": "ERROR", "msg": "Failed to get job-status for job id: 65ead130-e1c8-4e6b-b64d-3f786e44332d"}```
Is this happening locally? If so, running job-service in debug mode may be helpful to see what it logs
Hello Youssef. Improving error reporting is one of our H2 OKR. In the meantime, if you could point us to the flow, we could investigate manually and tell you the reason

This is awesome! yeah it’d be super helpful specially when takes more than an hour to run a flow on an input of this size :disappointed:

Don’t worry about it, I guess I’m gonna try running this flow locally so I get to monitor the logs. Thank tho!
